name: Editor AI
description: Generate Geometry Dash levels using AI!

spawn-batch-size.name: Spawn Speed (Objects/Tick)
spawn-batch-size.description: How many objects to place per tick after generation. Higher = faster but may cause brief lag on large levels. Default 8 is a good balance.

ollama-url.name: Ollama Server URL
ollama-url.description: URL of your local Ollama server

ollama-model.name: Ollama Model
ollama-model.description: Model name (auto-detected when Ollama is running)

enable-rate-limiting.name: Enable Rate Limiting
enable-rate-limiting.description: Prevents excessive API calls to save tokens and avoid rate limits

rate-limit-seconds.name: Minimum Seconds Between Requests
rate-limit-seconds.description: Minimum time between API requests (prevents spam)

enable-colors.name: AI Color Control
enable-colors.description: Allow AI to set object colors

enable-group-ids.name: AI Group IDs
enable-group-ids.description: Allow AI to assign Group IDs to objects

enable-triggers.name: Trigger Support ⚡
enable-triggers.description: AI can create and configure Alpha, Move, and Toggle triggers with touch activation

enable-advanced-level-editing.name: Advanced Level Settings
enable-advanced-level-editing.description: Allow AI to modify level settings like background/ground colors, start speed/mode, dual mode, etc. WARNING: This is experimental!
